title: Amazing
text: This app is supposedly going to get banned in the U.S. and honestly I don‚Äôt know what I‚Äôm going to do. This app is one of the reasons why I‚Äôm still here. It‚Äôs one of the reasons why I‚Äôm still alive. This app has impacted me in such a positive way. It has allowed me to interact with people my age. It has shown me that what ever I‚Äôm going through will soon get better. It‚Äôs made me more confident in my body. This app is the reason why I laugh everyday. This app makes me laugh, and smile. I don‚Äôt know what I‚Äôm going to do if it gets banned. This app has taught me to never be ashamed of your past. It has shown me that it‚Äôs ok to cry, that it‚Äôs ok to breakdown because it will eventually get better. It has taught me to always smile and to always be happy. This app has shown me that people are going through what I went through and that I‚Äôm not alone in the world. It‚Äôs the reason why I‚Äôm still here. This app has saved so many life's. It has stopped so many people from harming them selves. This app has made people love themselves for who they are. This app has made people love their body‚Äôs. And it‚Äôs not just the app, it‚Äôs the people who use it. So please, please don‚Äôt ban it.

title: Pretty Corrupt App
text: I‚Äôm gonna be honest with you, there gonna enforce guidelines on people who did nothing wrong and ignore those who are actively doing something bad, they are gonna stop showing your videos when you address a major topic, the racism, homophobia, xenophobia, etc... is out of control and you‚Äôll probably get doxxed over one of the things. Tik Tok will wait until the problem is way to far out of control to actually do anything about it. The only good things you may see on this app are some of the content creators, and I can‚Äôt even guarantee that they won‚Äôt be a pedo, or racist, or homophobic. (Speaking from experience, and this has happened more than once). Another issue is people could mass report your account for anything. While this comes in handy getting some of the bad people off the app, it won‚Äôt get rid of anyone verified, no matter how big of an issue it is, and will keep bad people who already had a platform on a pedestal. This is also an issue because people will mass report innocent people who had nothing to do with it. Don‚Äôt even get me started on the gender and age wars that people seem to need on there. It is absolutely not worth it, no matter how fun somebody makes. It will get depressing really fast. Don‚Äôt waste you time or sanity on this. We don‚Äôt want others to suffer like we do.

title: Really fun but is kinda buggy
text: I LOVE this app so much but there is one major problem that needs to be addressed, the bugs. I‚Äôm not sure if this actually is a bug but it‚Äôs still something that needs to be worked on, the algorithm. The TikTok algorithm is very weird and glitchy... I‚Äôm not sure if it was meant to be like this but it seems that only people who are straight, white, skinny, and do weird ‚Äútrendy‚Äù dances can get on the fyp (for you page). It is also very hard to gain followers because of this. The algorithm tends to really ignore creators that fall into the LGBTQ category, liberal category, cosplay category, anime category, or if you are just a poc who speaks out about the injustices in the world. TikTok algorithm will do something that is called shadow banning to creators if they aren‚Äôt ‚Äútrendy‚Äù and since it is very difficult to get on the fyp this happens to a lot of people. There are also things to talk about such as the actual bugs like when TikTok will randomly break for no reason, when you lose followers that didn‚Äôt actually unfollow you, and when you don‚Äôt get notifications when you should be. These are just a few things that have happened so far and I STRONGLY urge TikTok to try and fix these problems before they lose a whole bunch of people.

title: Tik Tok is very fun but...
text: Tik Tok is probably my most used app. Mostly because there is lots of comedy and dances you can learn. But one thing I don‚Äôt like about it is the fact that they don‚Äôt always take down inappropriate videos, but they do take down wholesome videos for no reason. Like on one Tik Toker, she made a video titled ‚ÄúBible Stories With Liv‚Äù. And guess what? It got taken down. When it was literally BIBLW STORIES. Yes I watched it before it got taken down, and it was very funny and about the bible story. But then I will see videos of girls/boys talking about or showing inappropriate things in their videos, and they might get reported dozens of times, but Tik Tok will not take it down. Another example, a girl posted a video of black lives matter, and, you guessed it. That got taken down, too! I just think that they could try harder. But some pros about the app is you can be very creative and inspiring. You can share your talents without having to be afraid. You can sing, act, dance, draw, paint, and so much more. It is so fun and I definitely recommend it. But if Tik Tok is reading this, please take my word about the taken down videos into consideration.  Thanks!

title: Great app, super fun!
text: I love this app! I was using it and it is super easy and fun to use. It took me literally 2 minutes to sign up and get my profile ready. It showed me how to scroll and like and all these other things to get me started! It is such a good app and I love how everyone can share ideas. One question though; why can't people without a lot of followers get discovered as much? They might take like, 2 hours making a video and doing their best quality and posting it with tags and all that, yet they still only may get 5 likes and it would take a long time to get more followers and be discovered. Lots of people who are popular on tiktok have it easy because they post a new video and so many people follow them that it instantly goes viral and all those other good videos made by people who haven't had a lot of followers yet get drowned out. That annoys me, but I won't complain too much. It could take years to get popular or could take months. Overall, this is a great app and I love it! The user interface is super clean and easy to access/use. Will keep this for a long time!

title: TikTok saved my life
text: I don‚Äôt usually write reviews about apps but had to write one about TikTok. If it weren‚Äôt for this app I probably wouldn‚Äôt be here. It has literally saved my life. title: Annoying UI and Constant format Issues
text:
So i‚Äôve had tiktok since it became a thing. I‚Äôm a lurker, but my saved videos are really important because i am an artist and i regularly download videos or use the Favorite option if i can‚Äôt download the video. This is the first issue. I have around 7000 favorites posts, which sounds insane but the reality is i probably only have 2000 actual posts while the rest are DELETED POSTS THAT I HAVE TO MANUALLY REMOVE. Do you guys realize how much of a pain that is? 

The second issue is the following limit and following accounts in general. There is no filter like on instagram or anything where you can find the least integrated with or the oldest followed accounts. again, YOU HAVE TO MANUALLY REMOVE ANY ACCOUNTS YOU NO LONGER WANT TO FOLLOW. Even deleted or removed accounts are still stuck there! it‚Äôs so annoying! 

Please for the love of god take the initiative and just create filters for the following lists, and make the favorites listings like for videos, sounds, etc easier to deal with. I don‚Äôt want to take an hour or two out of my day to just clear everything out when the tiktok developer team could fix it and make everyone‚Äôs lives easier. I just want the unavailable videos in my favorites gone, and i want a filter for the following lists. Please. It‚Äôs so frustrating.

title: Tiktok was great! But...
text: I've used tiktok for a couple of years now but recently it feels like my algorithm keeps pushing videos that I don't want to see :/ My fyp was exactly how I wanted it about a month ago since I like videos about games I enjoy, artists and jokes I like, etc. but recently it feels like every few videos on my for you page there's something I'm not interested in at all with millions of likes. Despite clicking "not interested" on these videos that keep appearing out of nowhere, the tiktok fyp keeps flooding me with popular videos that have nothing to do with my interests like hair tips and dancing videos. There's nothing wrong with videos like these being on tiktok but it's frustrating to see them show up over and over when I've never liked any videos that would push this content onto my fyp so much. It's gotten to the point where I've actually just closed out the app after a few minutes and went onto other video sharing apps just so I can see more content like I actually want to see. I'm not sure what caused such an abrupt change in the tiktok algorithm, but I'd rather see videos pertaining to my interests similar to ones I've liked even if they aren't popular as opposed to popular videos that I don't really care about :(

title: Not safe for marginalized communities
text:
I‚Äôve been on this app almost 3 years. It started out really fun I got to find a ton of friends that had similar interests. I began to grow my own community. overall it was a lot of fun and a great app for all. Since this app got bought out earlier in this year I‚Äôve noticed that hate speech of all kinds  homophobia, transphobia,Racism etc. are all boosted on for you pages verified creators that have been called out for being racist and homophobic still get to keep their platform still get promoted but the creators who try to report the hate speech and bring attention to what is happening on this app their videos get suppressed and deleted they‚Äôre told what they are saying is against community guidelines and when we all try to report the hate speech videos we all get denied and told that there‚Äôs nothing wrong with the videos. I used to feel very safe on this app and I was a proud TikTok user even when it was still considered cringe but after the buy out and the out poor of hate speech promotion that has occurred on this app I no longer wish to be a part of this community. 

But every time I try to draw my audience to other apps it‚Äôs conveniently suppressed. I used to love this app and I wish TikTok would get its priorities in order instead of just being performative when the times right.

title: Nice time passer but...
text: The content I get on my feed is great, it‚Äôs a mix of current information and cosplayers and weebs like me. Watching a few of these videos make time pass by quickly. However, if you don‚Äôt push out videos regularly your content is not going to be put out for anyone to see and that can be bad for content creators. Not only that but TikTok‚Äôs new update will suppress even more creators because you can buy viewers and buy followers. The only reason someone would need this feature is if they suddenly start getting suppressed, so what will TikTok do? Start hiding other people‚Äôs content. Then they have a reason to use the feature. So the only people you will see on TikTok are those who payed for you to see them. Of course there will be the rare few who don‚Äôt but they won‚Äôt have much followers or views. Not only that but TikTok is really bad at deciding what content needs a censorship. I‚Äôve seen videos where there was blood, violence, hate, etc. While they were censoring videos that had bright lights, even though they already had warned their viewers. TikTok only cares about the money it‚Äôs making, and currently it‚Äôs self destructing without realizing it. But at least TikTok helps create awareness of different song artists like Mother Mother.

title: Fun but frustrating
text: I absolutely love tiktok. It is so addicting and if you‚Äôre following users that post the content you like, it is probably the most entertaining app out there. I also love making my own videos and actually receiving recognition for them, unlike any other platform where only the people that follow you can see your content. As much as I love this app, there are also frustrating aspects of it. If you ever have a problem on tiktok and send them questions regarding it, don‚Äôt expect a response. Tiktok is terrible with responding to issues. My account has recently been blocked from posting for a week because I broke community guidelines, which is fine and I understand that, however - when I got it back after a week, I posted three videos in one day, none of which were a threat to the community guidelines whatsoever, and that same day I got blocked again! I have tried reaching out to them through the apps ‚Äúreport and issue ‚Äú section, email, and even Instagram! They have never gotten back to me and my account remains blocked. I take my account seriously as well as I have a good amount of followings. Tiktok, please resolve this issue of removing videos that aren‚Äôt inappropriate or blocking accounts that are innocent.

title: America needs Tiktok
text: The USA badly needed laws around data sharing long before TikTok came along, but since TikTok we‚Äôve had the first time Americans have actually talked in our entire history. Now, of all times, we need TikTok. My country faces civil unrest that won‚Äôt be solved without meaningful discourse. The way TikTok encourages people to have discussions about nuanced subjects on everything from personal growth to national politics with their own voices is revolutionary to our way of understanding ourselves and each other. Sure it comes with the pitfalls of social media - but I didn‚Äôt see Congress give half this energy to Facebook post-Cambridge Analytica. TikTok has personally changed my life, connected me with community like I‚Äôve never had before, and given me more focused purpose, and incidentally taken my business to the next level.   I‚Äôve had discussions and reached understandings with people of opposing political views like I never thought possible. Not only should you download this app, US citizens should write their representatives about why you should be allowed to continue to do so.

title: Disappointing
text: So first I would like to say I really do love the app for many reasons, but there are also many reasons why it is becoming my least favorite app now. One reason being, is that when anyone reports a video, even for no reason at all where it is not breaking community guidelines, the app does not allow it to be visible on your profile and is ‚Äúunder review‚Äù. One of mine was supposedly reported even though it did not break any community guidelines (and I read the full rules in fine print for the app) and it has been hidden from my profile to everyone for months. This happens on lives as well, if someone reports it the app automatically makes the live stop, even if it did not break any community guidelines. If someone wants to report a video, the video should be visible until deemed otherwise if it is in fact breaking any rules, then it should be deleted. Many users work hard for their content and they shouldn‚Äôt be punished for the small percentage of people who report any random content for whatever pleasure it brings them if it doesn‚Äôt break any guidelines. The app should also notify the user if their video was reported and is under review with factual evidence on why it is under review so the user can learn from it for next time, or if it is a mistake, can be resolved. And that is why I am rating it 1 star as of this time.

title: I love tiktok !

I found people who are just like me, people who are funny,People who love to do dyi projects, people who love to read and talk about it and give recs, people who were once elder Emos and love to bring nostalgia, hot mess moms, as well as fellowMillennials! title: Awful.
text: If you're on the app to scroll through videos, then this app is fine. however if you're a content creator and a commenter, this is not the app for you. it allows minors to be half naked and to act out fetishes but takes down adults content if the adult is smoking simply because they look like a minor. this app is a disgusting breeding ground of sex bots and pedophiles and the app does nothing about it. if you use your platform to call out a bully, it will remove your video and/or suspend your account for "bullying" whilst the actual bully is untouchable. tik tok rarely removes a verified creator even if there is proof of their wrong doings. it may sound crazy but if you violate their guidelines more than a few times, your completely pg videos lose views and get removed for "minor safety" and "harassment and bullying". it will revoke your ability to comment, message, and post if you violate the "guidelines" even if you have done nothing wrong and submitting an appeal rarely does a thing. it will punish you for the same violation multiple times. do not waste your time on this app.

title: Too many issues with my account
text: This app is a great way to find funny/cool content. I would give TikTok 5 stars if I wouldn‚Äôt have had as many issues with my account. I have had my account taken down without any videos violating the community guidelines. Just like that, no warning, just my account with thousands of followers gone. I appealed this decision and got it back about a week later. I read over the entire community guidelines and made absolutely sure none of my videos violated them. Recently, I‚Äôve had my account taken down for the second time without any reason why whatsoever. There was not any video I posted that ever violated the community guidelines yet my account is gone for the second time and I‚Äôll have to appeal it again. Other creators have had the same issue, they‚Äôll sign into the app and see their account is removed and they don‚Äôt know why. TikTok is great in terms of finding the videos you want to see. But I‚Äôm terms of creating videos I don‚Äôt know if I recommend it given that I‚Äôve put a lot of effort into my own videos just to have my whole account vanish for no reason‚Ä¶twice.

title: TikTok Support Never Replies
text: I spent over a year gaining around 27k followers before I was banned without any reasoning. I opened up my app one day and I had a white message on my screen saying that I was permanently banned for ‚Äúmultiple guideline violations.‚Äù I was never made aware that I violated any guidelines whatsoever. I submitted an appeal to being banned and still haven‚Äôt received anything back on whether my appeal was approved or denied. I sent 2 separate emails and still nothing. This isn‚Äôt the first time I‚Äôve tried to contact their support. I‚Äôve tried 10 times on my original account in the ‚Äúreport a problem‚Äù section and I never got any help. It‚Äôs funny how they ban any accounts that people report without actually looking into it. My account was centered around being part of the lgbtq+ community. So of course, there‚Äôs going to people who report my account because they don‚Äôt agree with my content. Yet they‚Äôll keep up accounts that go against their ‚Äúhate speech guidelines.‚Äù They had to even make it so that creators couldn‚Äôt message underage children and the same underage kids can‚Äôt receive comments. Just so people like James Charles and Tony Lopez can‚Äôt contact CHILDREN. Both creators are still allowed to have a platform on TikTok and make money off it. It‚Äôs sick. They won‚Äôt ban the people that are actually harmful.

title: Needs a few changes but is overall and app I love
text: The only problem I have that gets pretty annoying is that the fyp (for you page) and the following page are now set up so that you can swipe right from the fyp to get to the following page and left from the following page. This seems good at first that you don‚Äôt have to click the following or fyp buttons to get there, however if you have had the app for a while you know that it used to be whatever page you‚Äôre or (fyp or following) you used to just swipe right to see the persons account and other videos. Which leads to the inconvenience, if you accidentally swipe right you lose the video you are trying to watch and most likely will not be able to find it again. If you do it on purpose and you were trying to look at their page to see if you wanted to give them a follow, then you have to go back to your personal page and go back to your last liked video. Unless you didn‚Äôt like it then you will have an extremely difficult time finding again. I find this very annoying, as I do it multiple times a day.

title: Great App, But No Reason For This At All
text: TikTok is a great app but what happened to me made me very upset. Basically, a couple days ago I opened TikTok and when I went to my account I saw that my account was gone. Then I looked at my followings and I had none and then something popped up and said that my account was permanently banned because I violated community guidelines when I did absolutely nothing. I was just about ready to start crying because I had worked so hard on my account and everything was gone. Then after that I started to try and get back into my account but the same message kept popping up. I want to make a new one but I can‚Äôt because it won‚Äôt allow me to and I don‚Äôt even know what I did. I had posted a video and hadn‚Äôt posted for like 4 days but when I wanted to make a video I couldn‚Äôt. It made me really upset and it‚Äôd make me very happy if u would bring my account back. The same thing happened to one of my friends but she was actually able to make another account unlike mine. I can‚Äôt even watch other people‚Äôs videos without the message popping up. Plz make my wishes come true and bring it back. Other than that this is a great app and I love it!

title: Laggy and Unfair
text: My TikTok doesn‚Äôt receive the latest versions of the app until a long while later and it‚Äôs not fair when people are being reported for no reason. Accounts are now using captions to warn people that it‚Äôs fake so they don‚Äôt get reported. I don‚Äôt feel that should be necessary. And going live should be an option to everyone. It‚Äôs not fair when you have to have 1,000 followers because even people without 1,000 could still have fans that want them to go live. And what‚Äôs with the whole Verification thing? I don‚Äôt get why we need that. There shouldn‚Äôt be a status rank on the app. This app is for people older than 12 and I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs fair that the people who bend that rule have any right to report things because they are too young for that. The producer of the game should make an app similar to TikTok where it‚Äôs safe for younger kids to be on. Only kid friendly sounds and such. This way no one on TikTok will be reported for no reason. It could be called TikTok Junior or something. It could have all the same features but only kid friendly sounds and content. Sorry if you don‚Äôt agree, but those who are younger and are reporting for no reason are ruining others enjoyment. One of my videos was reported and I don‚Äôt cuss, or have any gore on my page. If a video is reported, it should actually be reviewed and looked at by a real person.
